title: Logan Paul threatens to kill KSI as YouTube rivals swap violent insults at London press conference
text:
Logan Paul has declared that he 'might kill' fellow YouTube star KSI with a 'first-round decapitation' when the two meet in their high-profile rematch at the Staples Center next month.

The fierce rivals fought out a draw in their first fight in Manchester last year, an event which drew in tens of millions of viewers and is regarded as the biggest amateur boxing match of all-time.

They will run it back on November 9, this time without head guards and wearing 10-ounce gloves as professional fighters, in a bout worth over £150million.

Scroll down for video

Ksi (left) faces off with Logan Paul at Monday's press conference at The Troxy in London

And the build-up was stepped up a notch as Paul and KSI came face-to-face in a press conference in London on Monday.

'All the support we gave you in World War II and this is how you return the favour?' Paul said after entering the Troxy to a chorus of boos. 'Winston Churchill would be ashamed.'

'I might kill this man,' the American continued. He added: ‘Y’all may not know it but JJ’s on his fifth abortion. His fifth. That’s five babies dead.

‘And I think I might return the favour. And I might kill you. I might end you. I’mma light you on fire, bro.'

Paul declared that he 'might kill' fellow YouTube star KSI with a 'first-round decapitation'

He added to KSI: 'You've got heart, I'll give you that, but that won't matter. I think you know that. You can work as hard as you like, but it doesn't matter. I respect you, but I'm going to have to end you, then I'm going to have to kiss your mom on the cheek, bro.'

Asked for his prediction, Paul replied: 'First-round decapitation.'

KSI, who found fame through his hilarious FIFA video game reactions, was also full of confidence looking ahead to the fight.

KSI did his best to get under his rival's skin ahead of their highly-anticipated rematch

'I have no respect for Logan Paul, I can't wait to finish you off,' he said. 'You used a dead dog for views, a dead guy for views; is there anything you wont use for views? Maybe your career once I'm done with it.

'November 9th you'll see all your boxing ability is going to go out of the window and you are going to be finished. I'm going to finish him, I'm going to make him suffer slowly.

'It's going to be five rounds of you suffering, then in the fifth round I'm going to end you.'
